class_notes: First semester of the two-semester Biology Honors Program available to SENIORS in their last two semesters at Emory.  See the Biology Department website for additional information.   Prerequisites:  Biology 142 + 142L, a declared Biology major, and a 3.5 minimum GPA.  Contact Tonya Woolcock at tdavis6@emory.edu for a permission number.
course_description: Prerequisite: consent of departmental honors coordinator. Independent research for students invited to participate in the biology department Honors Program.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1819, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Escobar, Status: Open
